com.phunware.mapping

Interface PwOnPOIClickListener


  • public interface PwOnPOIClickListener
    Used to get a callback when a POI (Point of Interest) has been clicked.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClick(PwPoint poi, android.graphics.PointF mapPoint, android.graphics.PointF touchPoint)
      Called when a POI has been clicked on.

    • Method Detail

      • onClick

        void onClick(PwPoint poi,
           android.graphics.PointF mapPoint,
           android.graphics.PointF touchPoint)
        Called when a POI has been clicked on.
        Parameters:
        poi - The POI that was clicked.
        mapPoint - The point on the map that was touched.
        touchPoint - The point on the view that was touched. This should always be on the screen.
